features: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Lemon Verbena air freshener spray is made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients, and gives your home instant freshening between cleaning days
Delivered in a non-aerosol spray to quickly freshen any room
Mrs. Meyer's products are made with cruelty-free formulas and are Leaping Bunny certified
Garden-inspired Lemon Verbena has a mild citrus air freshening scent that is light and refreshing
Mrs. Meyer's air freshener for home has thoughtfully chosen ingredients and is made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Room Fresheners are specifically made to quickly freshen any room, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Lemon Verbena scented room freshener has a light, refreshingly mild citrus fragrance. This tender herb blossoms in early summer and smells bright and new through and through. The non-aerosol bottle quickly freshens any room for instant fragrance. This room freshener is made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients. Perfect for when you need to add a little garden-inspired fragrance to your home between cleaning days. Made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors - and of course, always a cruelty free formula room air freshener. Bottles (less trigger) made with at least 30% post-consumer plastic. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as candles, laundry detergent, dish packs, and so much more!. Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Compassionate Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing room spray
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t in love with the lemon verbena scent off the bat. But after you spray it and it airs out into the room it does smell very nice and actually freshens up a room. I would definitely like to try other scents of this brand soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell doesn't last
reviews.reviewText: Smells fresh only for a very few minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great scent, crappy dispenser
reviews.reviewText: The spray mechanism broke on the second use, so that’s annoying. Otherwise, I love the scent. I’m migrating all my cleaning, laundry & freshening products to all natural and Mrs. Myers and Better Life both make fantastic items. I decanted this into a different spray bottle and it works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. Smell fresh and stays long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: I love this spray although I do wish it’ll last longer in the air or on the fabrics. Smells so darn good though I love this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: But does cover up those smells

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great with less chemicals
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. Plain and simple it smells great without being overpowering, sprays “cleaner” meaning it doesn’t leave a ton of residue or sticky “gunk” like a bigger name brand product I used to use, Febreze (am I allowed to say their name?). The other main reason I’ve “converted” to Mrs Meyers are the wide array of more delicate fragrances available which all smell great and actually do a better job of eliminating odors rather than just masking. What I’ve found is that for heavier odors, Febreze would require multiple uses. Meaning, I would spray quite heavily several times, return to the room with the odors and find that the odors still remain, requiring another series of repeated sprays. Contrast this to Mrs Meyers where several sprays eliminates the odors and when I return to the room find it does not need a secondary series of sprays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent of Lemon Verbena from Mrs. Meyers. I use all of the cleaning products and air fresheners. It makes my whole house smell wonderful. It is a little pricey but I think its worth it. If you haven't tried them, you are missing out.
